Articles.Content:
My wife is now mocking me for spamming "Refresh" every 30 seconds (for the

past 24 hours...)

There is a plugin. I don't use it as it angers some website admins.

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/reloadevery/

CTRL+F5 = force refresh....

*bash* *bash* *bash* *bash* *bash* *bash* *bash* *bash* *bash*
i would be so happy if it releases soon!

i dont think it comes today. look at all the streamers incl. scott. all have the same problem with framerate drops to 1 and infinit explosions when an astoroid is landet at kerbin.

i hope the fix this before release.

Pleasecomeouttodaypleasecomeouttodaypleasecomeouttoday...

Hey, I can dream, can't I?

Well, they are awake. Someone just updated a scratchpad build, not even an experimental. What we want to see is an update to public.

http://steamdb.info/app/220200/#section_history

Well, they are awake. Someone just updated a scratchpad build, not even an experimental. What we want to see is an update to public.

http://steamdb.info/app/220200/#section_history

[That_Guy_Mode]It's happening![/That_Guy_Mode]
Looking at previous update times, if it is coming out today, then it would probably be within the next 2 hours or so.

Steam Database just updated again.

http://steamdb.info/search/?a=app&q=220200

I'm still sticking with my prediction of Tuesday.

That said, checking here is the first thing I did when I woke up today. Most likely I'll be back every few hours until I fall asleep again.
Looking at previous update dates, if they put this thing out on a Friday they're in for a long weekend of coding.

Well, they are awake. Someone just updated a scratchpad build, not even an experimental. What we want to see is an update to public.

http://steamdb.info/app/220200/#section_history

Thank you for the actual link instead of posting just a screenshot!

EDIT: looking at the packages tab on that page, and it looks like there are some 'special subscribers' who are getting these latest builds...

http://steamdb.info/app/220200/#section_subs

Edited March 28, 2014 by Cmdr. Arn1e

http://steamdb.info/app/220200/#section_history

Another update! They're getting closer and closer together

That said, HOCGaming has just started streaming the NASA Arm pack. I doubt he would start streaming if he knew when the pack would release.

I just saw on HOCGaming's stream he had to change his setting to enable full screen when KSP loaded. So that leads me to believe it was a experimental build he was playing for the first time. If they are still sending out new builds then release is probably not imminent
[refresh refresh refresh]

I've become so desperate I've been participating in researching Kraken drive alternatives.

Must release the update soon otherwise there might be riots haha

Sorry guys. Definitely not out today, nor this weekend. New test builds are being pumped out, such as the one Harv is playing. If I am able to get a more definitive answer on a date or some type of range, you will definitely hear it in here. Thanks for being so patient.

Sorry guys. Definitely not out today, nor this weekend. New test builds are being pumped out, such as the one Harv is playing. If I am able to get a more definitive answer on a date or some type of range, you will definitely hear it in here. Thanks for being so patient.

This has ruined my day.

Sorry guys. Definitely not out today, nor this weekend. New test builds are being pumped out, such as the one Harv is playing. If I am able to get a more definitive answer on a date or some type of range, you will definitely hear it in here. Thanks for being so patient.

thats exactly this:

I choose to remain in denial... in my experience Squad always has their community manager lie about the release date immediately before any release involving asteroids.

Wow. Actual information re release dates. Something must be terrible wrong with the universe today.

That said, HOCGaming has just started streaming the NASA Arm pack. I doubt he would start streaming if he knew when the pack would release.

Something has changed in the relationship between squad and the media team with this release. I believe they do not appreciate the lack of clear release date information. They have a more direct and open relationship with viewers and so do not like participating in media teases. I was watching kurtjmac last night and he basically said he doesn't want to do vids of pre-release KSP material any more. The viewer number for the vids also appear down in comparison to last release.

I choose to remain in denial... in my experience Squad always has their community manager lie about the release date immediately before any release involving asteroids.

Umm, what releases involving asteroids?

Sorry guys. Definitely not out today, nor this weekend. New test builds are being pumped out, such as the one Harv is playing. If I am able to get a more definitive answer on a date or some type of range, you will definitely hear it in here. Thanks for being so patient.

I could of guessed, still don't like it :'(
